title: Country singer Cam surprises fans with news she is seven months pregnant with her first child
text:
She has been keeping an exciting secret for months.

Country singer Cam revealed to fans that she is expecting her first child very soon.

The 34-year-old was joined by her husband Adam Weaver in a video posted to Instagram on Tuesday when she made the announcement.

The reveal: Country singer Cam was joined by her husband Adam Weaver in a video posted to Instagram on Tuesday, when she made the announcement

The couple filmed a selfie video—showing them both from the chest up—Adam turned to her to ask 'you ready?'

'Yeah....We've been keeping a secret to ourselves for the past seven months.,' Cam (born Camaron Ochs) said. 'But I feel like it's time to let you guys in on it.'

With a wide grin, her husband walks and reveals her growing baby bump under a white turtleneck sweater dress.

Secrets: We've been keeping a secret to ourselves for the past seven months.,' Cam (born Camaron Ochs) said. 'But I feel like it's time to let you guys in on it'

Here it is: With a wide grin,her hubby walks and reveals her growing baby bump under a white turtleneck sweater dress

She placed her hands on her side and on top of her bump, before doing a small dance, shaking her hips.

The video was captioned 'S u R p R i S E !! little one you are already so loved.'

With news she is already in her seventh month, the little one will likely arrive mid-December to early January.

Going strong: Cam and Adam married in 2016 and celebrated their third wedding anniversary last month. The couple lives in Nashville Tennessee where Adam is a business broker

Cam and Adam married in 2016 and celebrated their third wedding anniversary last month. The couple lives in Nashville Tennessee where Adam is a business broker.

Throughout 2019 she has been recording her follow-up to 2015's Untamed. Cam has opened for artists such as Harry Styles, Sam Smith and George Straight.

She started her careering writing and composing songs for artists such as Smith and Miley Cyrus. Since she has released two album and had her song Burning House certified double platinum by RIAA.
